title: WP8 Emulator "Demo Mode"
body: It would be great to be able to use the WP8 emulator (and Surface emulator for that matter) for mobility demonstrations, i.e. when I deliver a Dynamics CRM demo I often (nearly always) want to include mobility scenarios on the same screen as the rest of the demo. Using the actual hardware is okay for an in-person demo but the form factor isn't ideal to demonstrate the functionality to the whole room. It's no good at all for remote demos.
